ComicInfo.Summary:
Inside issue 16 of 100% Biodegradable: Hard drinking, hot tempered sword and sorcery in Liam Sharp (Wonder Woman, X-Men, Batman) and John Freeman's 'Rourke Of The Radlands'. A Mars base gets infected by a deadly alien parasite in Paul Bradford (Octal, Hallowscream) and Luciano Fleitas' (H-alt, The Chronicles Of Terror) haunting sci-fi tale 'The Ides Of Mars'. The crew of Skow 709 run a gauntlet of ancient alien deathtraps in the second part of 'Skowdogs' by John Freeman (Judge Dredd Megazine, Crucible) and Dave Thomson (The Psychedelic Journal of Time Travel, Dr WTF?). Switchblade gains a new client as giant mutated germs infest the city in the second part of a three part series by Alan Burrows (Eagle, 2000ad) and Paul H.Birch (Toxic, Creepy Kofy Movie Time).
All this, and more!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-15 19:30:18. [CVDB595206]
